Package FinalProject

Class VehicleRentalSystem

java.lang.Object
FinalProject.VehicleRentalSystem
public class VehicleRentalSystem extends Object
Name: VehicleRentalSystem Abstract: This program calculates rental costs for up to three vehicles. It collects user inputs, validates them, and displays a summary including total rental cost and vehicle details.
Since:
12/07/2024
Author:
Keith Brock

      Name: DisplayVehicleDetails Abstract: Displays details for a single vehicle rental.
      Parameters:
      strVehicleType - The type of the vehicle.
      dblPricePerDay - The price per day for the vehicle.
      intRentalDays - The number of rental days.
      dblVehicleCost - The total cost for this vehicle.
      intVehicleNumber - The vehicle number in the sequence.
